name: Just Clone It
description: Just Clone It is a telegram bot based on the deployment of Solidity Contracts without any knowledge. The Smart Contract is already written and optimized by our developers, and ready to use in an easy way. Just chat with the telegram bot and deploy your first shitcoin with customized initial taxes, final taxes, auto-verify feature & more. Just Clone It actually handles the deployment of different types of tokens: - Basic ERC-20 - Shitcoin - Deflationary Token - Reflection Token - Staking Token Upcoming features on the Just Clone It bot: - Add custom socials in the auto-verifier - Deploy protocols such as OHMs, DEXes, & more - Deploy in multi EVM compatible chains
